title: Parent-Child Relationship Get
description: How to get a parent-child relationship.

response.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<gx:gedcomx xmlns:gx="http://gedcomx.org/v1/" xmlns:fs="http://familysearch.org/v1/" xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom">
    <gx:relationship type="http://gedcomx.org/ParentChild" id="FPPPX-PP0">
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPPX-PP3" rel="child" title="Person"/>
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPPX-PP1" rel="father" title="Person"/>
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPPX-PP1" rel="parent" title="Person"/>
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPPX-PP1" rel="person1" title="Person"/>
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPPX-PP3" rel="person2" title="Person"/>
        <gx:identifier type="http://familysearch.org/v1/ChildAndParentsRelationship">https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/child-and-parents-relationships/PPPX-PP0</gx:identifier>
        <gx:person1 resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPPX-PP1" resourceId="PPPX-PP1"/>
        <gx:person2 resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPPX-PP3" resourceId="PPPX-PP3"/>
    </gx:relationship>
    <gx:relationship type="http://gedcomx.org/ParentChild" id="MPPPX-PP0">
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPPX-PP3" rel="child" title="Person"/>
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPPX-PP2" rel="mother" title="Person"/>
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPPX-PP2" rel="parent" title="Person"/>
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPPX-PP2" rel="person1" title="Person"/>
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPPX-PP3" rel="person2" title="Person"/>
        <gx:identifier type="http://familysearch.org/v1/ChildAndParentsRelationship">https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/child-and-parents-relationships/PPPX-PP0</gx:identifier>
        <gx:person1 resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPPX-PP2" resourceId="PPPX-PP2"/>
        <gx:person2 resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPPX-PP3" resourceId="PPPX-PP3"/>
    </gx:relationship>
</gx:gedcomx>
